chapters.title: Chapter 26: The Extra Bit
chapters.info: Doesine Alwain, p. 509 (578)—Boyishly slim Aes Sedai of the Yellow Ajah. She is tall for a Cairhienin. Her father was a cutler. She ran away three times as a novice, although she only got as far as the gates once. She has a bit of a foul tongue.
